授業目的: The aim of this course is to develop students' speaking, writing, listening, reading, vocabulary-building, and language analysis skills.  Doing various language activities, students will improve their communication skills and give them the confidence to use English.
到達目標:
By the end of this course, students should be able to improve thier overall English skills
and should be able to say what they want to say(write) when they want to say(write).
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

【合併】英語IIａ　１５（経済学部）/英語IIIａ　１５（経済学部）
授業方法: This course includes both lectures and student-centered activities such as pair work, group work, presentation, etc.

第1回:
Introduction / Course Description / Course Requirements
Warm-up activities / Listening / Speaking / Reading
The Detailed schedule of the course is given, so attendance is a must.
トピック.授業計画1:
Each lesson starts with warm-up activities such as greeting, listening to popular music, and reading a short newspaper article. And a short presentation using a newspaper article follows. Then each unit of the textbook will be covered. One classroom hour is spent on one unit of the textbook and presentation by the students.
The first week lesson of this course includes introduction, course description and course requirements. Detailed procedure of this course will be clearly explained in class. Students will be given the schedule, and given the information as to what they are supposed to do in class. Therefore attendance on the first day is a MUST.
Students are expected to actively get involved in language activities and students are encouraged to use English in class. They are also encouraged to ask questions and negotiate for clarification and meaning.
トピック.授業外学習2:
It is desirable that students purchase the textbook and an English notebook before the first class.
Students are required to attend the class regularly without being late.
Preparation for each unit is a must. There is a penalty for unexcused absence.
